title: Implement Security Monitoring and Audit Logging
description: Implement Security Monitoring and Audit Logging.

effort_estimate.justification: Security monitoring and audit logging are essential for detecting and responding to security threats.

user_stories: As a security administrator, I want to monitor security events so that I can detect and respond to security threats.
business_rules: Security event monitoring must be implemented.
Audit log collection must be implemented.
Access control must be implemented for observability tools.
edge_cases: Managing high volumes of audit logs.

acceptance_criteria: Access control is implemented for observability tools.

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure security events and audit logs are properly monitored.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the security monitoring and audit logging system to prevent unauthorized access.
